wo["FollowMethod"] = FOLLOW_SCROLL wo["AllowSingleOxyds"] = true wo["AutoRespawn"] = true
ti[" "] = {"fl_sahara"} ti["#"] = {"st_rawglass"} ti["S"] = {"st_switch", target="set_stone"} ti["x"] = {"it_rubberband", name="here"}
w, h = wo(ti, " ", 12+#stones, 13) wo:drawBorder(po(0, 0), wo["Width"], wo["Height"], ti["#"]) wo[{1,1}] = {"#ac_marble_black"} wo[{1,2}] = {"#ac_marble_white"} wo[{1,3}] = ti["x"]
wo[po(5, 1)] = {"st_rawglass"} wo[po(5, 2)] = {"st_rawglass"} wo[po(5, 3)] = {"st_rawglass"} wo[po(5+#stones+1, 1)] = {"st_rawglass"} wo[po(5+#stones+1, 2)] = {"st_rawglass"} wo[po(5+#stones+1, 3)] = {"st_rawglass"} wo[po(1, 6)] = {"it_vortex", name="begin", destination="end", autoopen=true, autoclose=true} wo[po(w-2, 6)] = {"it_vortex", name="end", destination="begin", autoopen=true, autoclose=true}
for i=1, #floors do wo[po(165+i, 9)] = floors[i] wo[po(165+i, 10)] = floors[i] wo[po(165+i, 12)] = {"st_switch", target="set_floor"} wo[po(165+i, 11)] = {"it_document", text=floors[i]["_text"]} end -- Floors on demand: function set_floor(value, sender) wo[po(sender) - po(0, 1)] = {"it_document", text=floors[sender.x-165]["_text"]} -- Floortile express worldwide: if no["here"]:exists() then wo[no["here"] + po(0,1)] = floors[sender.x-165] end end
for i=1, #items do wo[po(5+i, 12)] = {"st_switch", target="set_item"} wo[po(5+i, 9)] = items[i] wo[po(5+i, 11)] = {"it_document", text=items[i]["_text"]} end
-- Items on demand: function set_item(value, sender) wo[po(sender) - po(0, 3)] = items[sender.x-5] wo[po(sender) - po(0, 1)] = {"it_document", text=items[sender.x-5]["_text"]} -- Item express worldwide: if no["here"]:exists() then wo[no["here"] + po(0,1)] = items[sender.x-5] end end
for i=1, #stones do wo[po(5+i, 1)] = stones[i] wo[po(5+i, 2)] = ti["#"] wo[po(5+i, 3)] = ti["S"] wo[po(5+i, 4)] = {"it_document", text=stones[i]["_text"]} end
-- Stones express worldwide: function set_stone(value, sender) wo[po(sender) + po(0, 5)] = stones[sender.x-5] wo[po(sender) + po(0, 1)] = {"it_document", text=stones[sender.x-5]["_text"]} if no["here"]:exists() then wo[no["here"]+po(0,1)] = stones[sender.x-5] end end
